ingredients: 1 ½ lbs chicken thighs,smoked, grilled and diced ( or alternatively, 3 cups rotisserie chicken, or cooked chicken that has been seasoned with smoked salt)
2 ears corn on the cob, shucked and kernals removed
2 poblano chiles ( or pasillo), divided --save one for Tomatillo Sauce
2 poblano chiles ( or pasillo), divided --save one for Tomatillo Sauce
10 ounces crumbled queso fresco cheese (or use shredded Mexican cheese blend)
1 cup diced white onion or two shallots
Garnishes: fresh cilantro, sour cream and hot sauce
Garnishes: fresh cilantro, sour cream and hot sauce
Garnishes: fresh cilantro, sour cream and hot sauce
